title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aapse apni kala yatra ke baare mein kuch batana chahti hoon.
Anushka: Yaad hai bachpan mein, rangon se kitna pyaar tha? Diwaron par bhi chala deta thi! Maa daantati thi, par dil mein ek khushi hoti thi.
Anushka: Woh khushi, dheere dheere mera junoon ban gayi. School ke drawings se lekar college ke canvases tak, rang mere dost ban gaye.
Anushka: Phir ek waqt aaya jab laga, shayad ye sirf hobby hai. Zimmedariyan badh gayi thin.
Anushka: Lekin ek din, maine ek buzurg mahila ko mandir mein rangoli banate hue dekha. Unke chehre par jo shanti thi...bas, mujhe raasta mil gaya.
Anushka: Maine phir se shuru kiya. Aur ab, har rangoli, har painting, ek kahani hai. Meri kahani.
Anushka: Art sirf ek hunar nahi hai, doston. Yeh khud ko pehchanna hai.
Anushka: Toh agar aapke andar bhi koi aag hai, toh use jalne do. Rang bharo apni zindagi mein! Dhanyavaad!
